content:
I was really surprised by how much I enjoyed the third season of "Stranger Things". I loved the new characters, especially Robin, and the way the story expanded to include more of the town's history. The finale was so intense, and I'm still trying to process everything that happened. I'm really curious to see how they'll resolve the cliffhanger and what's in store for the gang in season 4.

What about you, do you have any favorite characters or storylines from the show?
